title: Services Act 2017 (No. 29 of 2017), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 12. (1) The Forum shall hold such and so many meetings as the chairperson
text_raw:
12. (1) The Forum shall hold such and so many meetings as the chairperson 
may consider necessary for the performance of its functions as set out in section 
26 of the Act and, subject to the following paragraphs, may adopt its own rules 
and procedures. 

(2) The quorum for a meeting of the Forum shall be a simple majority of the 

current appointed membership at any time. 

(3) The Forum may act notwithstanding any vacancies in its membership, 
and its proceedings shall not be invalidated by any such vacancies, subject to a 
quorum being present as set out in Regulation 10(2). 

(4) The chairperson may invite such persons as he or she considers 

appropriate to attend any meeting of the Forum in an advisory capacity. 

Other Matters
